Katholieke Universiteit Leuven
M.Sc. Computer Science

item.title: experience
item.description:
Site Reliability Engineer
Atlas Copco Group
October 2025 – Present, Antwerp, Belgium

Developed function apps for data validation, implemented infrastructure as code, and built alerting pipelines using structured queries and custom dashboards.

Tech: Python, Terraform, New Relic, Microsoft Azure

Engineering Intern
Life Sciences Department, imec
March 2025 – June 2025; Leuven, Belgium

Developed a custom plugin for multimodal cellular analysis, integrating deep learning pipelines for segmentation, tracking, and visualization with scalable cloud deployment

Tech: Python, PyQt, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Google Cloud

Engineering Intern
Nokia Bell Labs
July 2024 – August 2024; Antwerp, Belgium

Designed and deployed a microservices-based application for telemetry analysis and automated control of Optical Network Units (ONUs) within the Network Infrastructure division

Tech: Python, Flask, REST APIs, Pub/Sub Messaging, Bash

Software Engineer - II
Walmart Global Technology Services India Pvt. Ltd
July 2022 – August 2023; Bengaluru, India

Worked on an end-to-end tracking system for Sam’s Club Supply Chain to monitor domestic and international deliveries and generate data-driven insights into evolving logistics trends

Tech: Java, Spring Boot, REST APIs, MySQL, Kafka, Karate

Engineering Intern
Walmart Global Technology Services India Pvt. Ltd
May 2021 – July 2021; Bengaluru, India

Optimized shipment packaging by implementing 4D Bin Packing algorithms and designing a regression-based order routing model to improve logistics efficiency

Tech: Java, Spring Boot, REST APIs, JUnit, JMeter
